player.name: Dirk Nowitzki
player.physicalDescription: very tall 7'0" lanky frame, shaggy blonde hair, pale white skin, goofy lovable smile, German features, unconventional basketball body
player.archetype: The Outsider, revolutionized big man shooting, defeated superteams

figure.name: Judah Maccabee
figure.attributeDescription: war hammer (Maccabee means 'the hammer'), golden menorah representing the miracle of lights and Jewish resistance
figure.visualStyle: Jewish resistance fighter and military leader, Hasmonean warrior
figure.clothing: practical Jewish warrior garments, leather armor over tunic, Hellenistic-era military gear adapted for guerrilla warfare, cloth head covering
figure.physicalDescription: strong fierce warrior, dark curly hair and beard, intense determined eyes, battle-ready stance, olive skin, the look of a man who fights against impossible odds
figure.archetype: The Hammer, led outnumbered rebels to defeat the mighty Greek empire

connection.thematic: Both were unlikely heroes who defeated vastly superior forces through heart and cunning
connection.narrative: Dirk took down the Heatles like Judah took down the Greeks. Underdogs who rewrote history.
connection.relationship: Warriors who proved the mighty can fall to the determined

interactions.description: Dirk with fadeaway, Judah swinging hammer - striking down giants
Underdog warriors ready to face any challenge
